firstNightReminder: The Maid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, …) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.
otherNightReminder: The Maid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, …) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.
name: Maid
ability: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.

otherNightReminder: The Pianist points to a player, different from the previous night. If that player is the Mastermind: Wake the Mastermind. Show the Pianist token. Point to the Pianist. The Mastermind does not act tonight.
name: Pianist
ability: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Mastermind, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.

name: Astronaut
ability: The first time you die, you don't.

otherNightReminder: The Apprentice Detective points to a player, and a character on their sheet. If incorrect, the Apprentice Detective dies.
name: Novice Detective
ability: Each night*, choose a player & guess their character: if you guess wrong, you die.

firstNightReminder: Show the marked character token. Point to the marked player.
otherNightReminder: If the Aikido Master’s Friend was killed by the Mastermind tonight: The Aikido Master dies.
name: Aikido Master
ability: You start knowing a hope player & their character. If the Mastermind kills them, you die too.

otherNightReminder: The previously protected and drunk players lose those markers. The Innkeeper points to two players. Those players are protected. One is drunk.
name: Entomologist
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they can't die tonight, but 1 is an imitation until dusk.

name: Robot
ability: Executed hope players might not die.

otherNightReminder: If the Artist has not used their ability: The Artist either shakes their head no, or points to a player. If that player is a Classmate, they are now alive.
name: Artist
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: if they are a Classmate, they are resurrected.

firstNightReminder: The Survivor points to a living player. Either the Survivor, or the chosen player, is now an Imitation.
otherNightReminder: The previously Imitation player is no longer an Imitation. The Survivor points to a living player. Either the Survivor, or the chosen player, is now an Imitation.
name: Survivor
ability: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are an Imitation until dusk. You can't die.

name: Caregiver
ability: If both your alive neighbours are hope, they can't die.

firstNightReminder: The Inventor either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character on the sheet. If the Inventor used their ability: If that character is in play, that player is an Imitation for 3 nights and 3 days.
otherNightReminder: Reduce the remaining number of days the marked player is an Imitation. If the Inventor has not yet used their ability: The Inventor either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character on the sheet. If the Inventor used their ability: If that character is in play, that player is an Imitation for 3 nights and 3 days.
name: Inventor
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are an Imitation for 3 nights & 3 days.

name: Magician
ability: When a Traitor dies by execution, all other players (except Travellers) are Imitations until dusk tomorrow.

otherNightReminder: If the Leader of Evil’s public statement was true: Choose a player not protected from dying tonight. That player dies.
name: Leader of Evil
ability: Each day, you may make a public statement. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.

name: Anthropologist
firstNightReminder: If 7 or more players: Show the Anthropologist a number of arbitrary 'Traitors', players equal to the number of Traitors in play. Show 3 character tokens of arbitrary hope characters. If the token received by the Anthropologist is a Mastermind that would wake tonight: Allow the Anthropologist to do the actions of the Mastermind. Place their 'attack' markers. If the Anthropologist selected players: Wake the Mastermind. Show the 'attack' marker, then point to each marked player. Remove any Anthropologist 'attack' markers.
otherNightReminder: Allow the Anthropologist to do the actions of the Mastermind. Place their 'attack' markers. If the Anthropologist selected players: Wake the Mastermind. Show the 'attack' marker, then point to each marked player. Remove any Anthropologist 'attack' markers.
ability: You think you are a Mastermind, but you are not. The Mastermind knows who you are & who you choose at night.

name: Tennis Pro
ability: You might die at any time.

name: Monotaro
ability: Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability is an Imitation until dusk. You become their alignment.

name: Monophanie
otherNightReminder: If Monophanie used their ability to target a player today: If that player is hope, they die.
ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player. Tonight, if it was a hope player, they die.

name: Monosuke
firstNightReminder: Monosuke points to a living player, different from the previous night. That player survives execution tomorrow.
otherNightReminder: Monosuke points to a living player, different from the previous night. That player survives execution tomorrow.
ability: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.

name: Monokid
firstNightReminder: Show each of the Outsider tokens in play.
otherNightReminder: If an Outsider died today: Monokid points to a player. That player dies.
ability: You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. If 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. [−1 or +1 Outsider]

name: Monodam
ability: If the Mastermind dies by execution (ending the game), play for 1 more day. If a player is then executed, their team loses.

name: Exisal
otherNightReminder: If the Exisal has not yet used their ability: The Exisal either shows the 'no' head signal, or points to a player. That player dies.
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.

otherNightReminder: One player that the Cosplayer chose the previous night might be resurrected. The Cosplayer points to two players. Those players die.
name: Cosplayer
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be resurrected.

firstNightReminder: The Recreation points to a player. That player is poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The Recreation points to a player. That player is poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies.
name: Recreation
ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.

otherNightReminder: If Homeroom chose no-one the previous night: Homeroom points to three players. Otherwise: The Homeroom either shows the 'no' head signal , or points to a player. Chosen players die.
name: Homeroom
ability: Each night*, you may choose a player: they die. If your last choice was no-one, choose 3 players tonight.

otherNightReminder: If no-one died during the day: The Outside World points to a player. That player dies.
name: Outside World
ability: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.
